ucsc
Class GetUCSCDna

java.lang.Object
  server.Domain
      ucsc.GetUCSCDna

public class GetUCSCDna
extends Domain

This class accesses the UCSC website to retrieve sequence information using chromosome locations. Valid organism names are as follows:

Version:

query

protected java.lang.String query
The query part of this ucsc url.

g

protected java.lang.String g
Represents the GetDna type

db

protected java.lang.String db
The database type (unique to ucsc)

padding5

protected java.lang.String padding5
The amount of padding to be added to the 5' end of the sequence

padding3

protected java.lang.String padding3
The amount of padding to be added to the 3' end of the sequence

maskRepeats

protected java.lang.String maskRepeats
Specifies whether repeat segments of the sequence should be masked. This function is always "on" for SolPicker.

boolShadeRepeats

protected java.lang.String boolShadeRepeats

casing

protected java.lang.String casing
Specifies the case (upper or lower) of the bases in the sequence. "upper" is used for SolPicker to differentiate from the lower case repeats.

repMasking

protected java.lang.String repMasking
Specifies the case (upper or lower) of the repeats segments of the sequence. "lower" is used for SolPicker.

revComp

protected java.lang.String revComp
Specifies if the revComp should be retrieved. Default is set to "0".

defaults

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> defaults
A Map representing the default values with their corresponding names.

GetUCSCDna

public GetUCSCDna(java.lang.String chr,
                  java.lang.String loc1,
                  java.lang.String loc2)
Creates a GetUCSCDna object with chromosome number, start position, and end location set equal to the parameters

Parameters:
chr - chromosome number/letter
loc1 - chromosome start location
loc2 - chromosome end location

protected void createURL()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Creates the URL to be searched using a UCSC url (which retrieves a fasta sequence) and the chromosome locations.

cutHeader

public java.lang.String cutHeader(java.lang.String fasta)
Returns a substring representing the header of the fasta file. This method is used because the sequence needs to be separated from its header so that it can be split into oligos, but the header is still preserved.

Specified by:
cutHeader in class Domain
Parameters:
fasta - - the fasta sequence produced from the URL
Returns:
- String representing fasta file
